name: The Orphanage
description:
On a stormy night. Zack, a boy who lives a JJ Randall Orphanage awakes to the sound of screams. Confined to his room all he can do is listen to the horric sounds coming from the rooms nearby. Taking control of Zack, you find the Orphanage empty with no one around. Until you come across the resident doctor. Quickly realising something is seriously wrong and your life is in danger, Zack has a simple choice.. Run. Escape. Survive.



With lots of puzzles to solve, Keys to find, Puzzle items to obtain to help progress through the game to lead to your escape. The Orphanage is a puzzle horror game with a story to tell and a dreaded atmosphere to keep you on the edge of your seat.
